schema.title: Specify Assignee And Approver For Tasks
schema.description:
Following Tasks will be created based on the Asset Change Type Activity. Please assign suitable users for each task. The users will get notifications and the tasks will be assigned accordingly.

Note: New tasks get created once the previous task is completed.

inputVariables.name: identifySecurityControl
inputVariables.label: Assignee For Task: Identify Security Control
inputVariables.title: Lookup (One to Many or One to One)
inputVariables.tooltip: Identify Impacted CIP-005 & CIP-007 Security Control.

inputVariables.name: verifySoftwareSource
inputVariables.label: Assignee For Task: Verify Software Source
inputVariables.title: Lookup (One to Many or One to One)
inputVariables.tooltip: Verify Identify & Integrity of Software Source.

inputVariables.name: assigneeApprovalToImplement
inputVariables.label: Assignee For Task: Approval To Implement
inputVariables.title: Lookup (One to Many or One to One)
inputVariables.tooltip: Assignee Approval to proceed with the implementation.

inputVariables.name: approverApprovalToImplement
inputVariables.label: Approver For Task: Approval To Implement
inputVariables.title: Lookup (One to Many or One to One)
inputVariables.tooltip: Approvering authority For this Task: Approval To Implement

inputVariables.name: implementChange
inputVariables.label: Assignee For Task: Implement Change
inputVariables.title: Lookup (One to Many or One to One)

inputVariables.name: verifySecurityControl
inputVariables.label: Assignee For Task: Verify Security Control
inputVariables.title: Lookup (One to Many or One to One)
inputVariables.tooltip: Verify & Document Impacted CIP-005 & CIP-007 Security

inputVariables.name: updateBaseline
inputVariables.label: Assignee For Task: Update Baseline
inputVariables.title: Lookup (One to Many or One to One)

routes.name: Activity In Process -> Identify Security Control
Approver Approval To Implement -> Approver Approval To Implement Task Complete
Assignee And Approver Name -> Activity In Process
routes.label: Add Task

routes.name: Assignee Approval To Implement -> Assignee Approval To Implement Task Complete
Assignment And Approver Name -> Do Nothing
routes.label: Cancel

routes.name: Check Approver 3 -> Assignee Approval To Implement
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Approver Approval To Implement Task Complete -> Implement Change
Assignee Approval To Implement Task Complete -> Is Approver Assigned
Identify Security Control Task Complete -> Verify Software Source
Implement Change Task Complete -> Verify Security Controls
Update Baseline Task Complete -> Mark Activity Closed
Verify Security Controls Task Complete -> Update Baseline
Verify Software Source Task Complete -> Assignee Approval To Implement
Check Approver 2 -> Implement Change
routes.label: No

routes.name: Get Correlated Asset -> Assignee And Approver Name

Implement Change -> Implement Change Task Complete
Start -> Get Correlated Asset
Update Baseline -> Update Baseline Task Complete
Verify Security Controls -> Verify Security Controls Task Complete
Verify Software Source -> Verify Software Source Task Complete
